title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: LCD of  1 ,  4 over y, , and , fraction, 12 over, y squared,   is  y squared

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$y^2-4y=12$$
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get , y squared minus 4 y is equal to 12
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  , y squared minus 4 y is equal to 12

title: Solve The Equation
text: $$y^2-4y=12$$ becomes $$y^2-4y-12$$ becomes $$\left(y-6\right) \left(y+2\right)$$. Our solutions are thus $$y=6$$ and $$y=-2$$
speech: y squared minus 4 y is equal to 12  becomes  y squared, minus 4 y minus 12  becomes  parentheses y minus 6,  times, parentheses y plus 2,  . Our solutions are thus  y is equal to 6  and  y, is equal to negative 2
